alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 8:59PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Thomas, northwestern Logan and southeastern Sherman Counties through 830 PM MDT/930 PM CDT/... At 758 PM MDT/858 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Brewster, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winona. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 28 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT/1000 PM CDT/ for northwestern and west central Kansas.
